title: Playin super tank Malphite jungle, counter ganked bot, got Yi... Liss almost dies
body:
{{champion:236}} (*Dashes forward and ults towards Liss*)
{{champion:54}} (*Catches every single shot and only took about a quarter of his HP*)
{{champion:54}} .......
{{champion:54}} (*Ctrl-4*) 
{{champion:54}} (*Walks away*)

I just thought it was hilarious while it was happening and had to share :^)
